cleaned.title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard USDS and sUSDS to Aave v3
cleaned.author: 0x57ab7ee15cE5ECacB1aB84EE42D5A9d0d8112922

raw.title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard USDS and sUSDS to Aave v3
raw.author: 0x57ab7ee15cE5ECacB1aB84EE42D5A9d0d8112922
raw.body:
## Title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard USDS and sUSDS to Aave v3

## Author: @ACI

## Date: 2024-08-28

---

### **Summary**

This proposal aims to onboard USDs and sUSDS, the rebranded DAI and sDAI tokens to Aave v3. 

### **Motivation**

DAI has been a cornerstone asset in the Aave ecosystem, with a long and successful history of supply across various versions of the protocol. MakerDAO marked a significant milestone with a rebranded to Sky, introducing USDS and sUSDS as the new iterations of DAI and sDAI. Given the established track record and widespread adoption of their predecessors, we propose to onboard these new assets to Aave v3.

By integrating USDS and sUSDS into Aave v3, we aim to maintain continuity for users who have relied on DAI and sDAI while embracing the evolution of these assets under the Sky brand.

### **Proof of Liquidity and Deposit Commitments**

Sky protocol team has discussed providing both token incentives and liquidity provision when USDS is onboarded. ACI is in discussion with members of Sky protocol team to finalize these programs.  

### **Specification**

Based on discussion with members of Sky protocol team, we propose the following: 

- sUSDS added as collateral and borrow asset to Aave v3 Main Instance
- USDS added as supply and borrow asset to Aave v3 Lido Instance
- Integration with Paraswap to allow users to seamlessly swap between DAI and USDS variants within the Aave system.

We invite all service providers and community members to weigh in on these suggestions. 

Final contract addresses will be provided upon final launch of the Sky protocol.  

Risk Parameters will be provided at ARFC Stage by Risk Service Providers.

**Disclaimer:**

This proposal is powered by Skywards. ACI is not directly affiliated with Sky and did not receive compensation for creation this proposal.

### **Next Steps**

1. If consensus is reached on this [TEMP CHECK], escalate this proposal to the Snapshot stage.
2. If the Snapshot outcome is YAE, this proposal will be escalated to ARFC stage
3. Publication of a standard ARFC, collect community & service providers feedback before escalating proposal to ARFC snapshot stage
4. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal

### **Copyright:**

Copyright and related rights waived under [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)

raw.body:
---

Title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard BNBx on Aave V3 BNB Chain  
Author: ACI (Aave Chan Initiative)
Date: 2024-03-04

---

## **Summary**

This TEMP CHECK proposes the addition of BNBx from Stader to Aave V3 BNB Chain to enhance LST liquidity and asset diversity.

## **Motivation**

BNBx is a liquid staked token of BNB from Stader. Users can freely mint BNBx in exchange for BNB deposits and earn yield from staking.

The Aave-Chan Initiative supports LST diversity in Aave V3 and looks to add more LST to the new BNB Chain deployment.

## **Specification**

Contract address: [0x1bdd3cf7f79cfb8edbb955f20ad99211551ba275](https://bscscan.com/token/0x1bdd3cf7f79cfb8edbb955f20ad99211551ba275)

Detailed risk parameters will be formulated and shared in the ARFC phase, after positive community feedback from this TEMP CHECK.

**Useful Links**

- Website: https://www.staderlabs.com/
- BNBx docs: https://binance.docs.staderlabs.com/

## Disclaimer

The ACI is not presenting this TEMP CHECK on behalf of any third party and is not compensated for creating this ARFC.

## Next Steps

1. If consensus is reached on this [TEMP CHECK], escalate this proposal to the Snapshot stage.
2. If the Snapshot outcome is YAE, this proposal will be escalated to ARFC stage
3. Publication of a standard ARFC, collect community & service providers feedback before escalating proposal to ARFC snapshot stage
4. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal

Title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard wbETH on Aave V3 BNB Chain 
Author: ACI (Aave Chan Initiative)
Date: 2024-03-05

---

## **Summary**

This TEMP CHECK proposes the addition of wbETH the Binance Liquid Staked ETH Token to Aave V3 BNB Chain to enhance LST liquidity and asset diversity.

## **Motivation**

Liquid Staked Tokens are one of the premier collateral types on Aave and drive most of the ETH borrow demand. wBETH is one of the largest Liquid Staking Tokens on the market and one of the more productive assets available on BNB Chain.  

The Aave-Chan Initiative supports LST diversity in Aave V3 and looks to add more LST to the new BNB Chain deployment.

## **Specification**

Contract: [0xa2E3356610840701BDf5611a53974510Ae27E2e1](https://bscscan.com/token/0xa2E3356610840701BDf5611a53974510Ae27E2e1)

Detailed risk parameters will be formulated and shared in the ARFC phase, after positive community feedback from this TEMP CHECK.

**Useful links:** 
- Website: https://www.binance.com/en/ethereum-staking

## Disclaimer

The ACI is not presenting this TEMP CHECK on behalf of any third party and is not compensated for creating this ARFC.

## Next Steps

1. If consensus is reached on this [TEMP CHECK], escalate this proposal to the Snapshot stage.
2. If the Snapshot outcome is YAE, this proposal will be escalated to ARFC stage
3. Publication of a standard ARFC, collect community & service providers feedback before escalating proposal to ARFC snapshot stage
4. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal

cleaned.title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard osGNO to Aave v3 Gnosis
cleaned.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193

raw.title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard osGNO to Aave v3 Gnosis
raw.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193
raw.body:
---
### [TEMP CHECK] Onboard osGNO to Aave v3 Gnosis
### Author: ACI
###  Date: 2024-07-29
---

### **Summary**

This proposal aims to Onboard osGNO, the Liquid Staking Token (LST) of StakeWise V3 into the GnosisMarket. By integrating osGNO, Aave users will be provided with additional liquidity and yield opportunities while supporting the growth of LSTs within the DeFi ecosystem on Gnosis Chain.

### **Motivation**

GNO is used for governance within the GnosisDAO and acts as a staking token for Gnosis Chain. 

osGNO is a Liquid Staking Token (LST) representing GNO staked in StakeWise V3 on Gnosis Chain. It can be minted from any Vault created in StakeWise on Gnosis in order to make a user’s stake liquid. Users have the option of staking in one of the Vaults in the Marketplace to mint osGNO, creating their own Vault as a solo staker and minting osGNO from there, or purchasing osGNO directly on a DEX.

Creating Vaults and staking in them is a permissionless process on StakeWise, and so is access to osGNO. For additional protection, every minted osGNO has an excess backing of staked tokens, provided by the minters themselves.  

osGNO increases in value relative to GNO as staking rewards accrue, it can be redeemed for the underlying GNO within Vaults using the redemption mechanism detailed [here](https://docs.stakewise.io/protocol-overview-in-depth/oseth#redemption-mechanism). If there are not sufficient liquid reserves available for redemption, there may be delays in unstaking and redeeming the osGNO for underlying GNO which could result in a temporary depeg.

osETH was recently added as collateral on Aave v3 Ethereum and has seen good adoption. In order to improve Aave’s marketshare on Gnosis Cchain, and support the Gnosis and StakeWise ecosystems it is proposed to also Onboard osGNO into Gnosis Market.

### **Proof of Liquidity and Deposit Commitments**

Potential POL and Deposit Commitments will be discussed at ARFC stage.

### **Specification**

Contract address: 0xF490c80aAE5f2616d3e3BDa2483E30C4CB21d1A0

Risk Parameters will be provided at ARFC Stage by Risk Service Providers.

### **Useful Links:**

osGNO announcement post: https://stakewise.medium.com/announcing-the-launch-of-stakewise-v3-on-gnosis-chain-0231285bd8e3

osGNO Vaults: https://app.stakewise.io/vaults

### **Disclaimer:**

This proposal is powered by Skywards. ACI is not directly affiliated with StakeWise and did not receive compensation for creation this proposal.

ACI and some ACI team members are holders of GNO.

### **Next Steps**

1. If consensus is reached on this [TEMP CHECK], escalate this proposal to the Snapshot stage.
2. If the Snapshot outcome is YAE, this proposal will be escalated to ARFC stage
3. Publication of a standard ARFC, collect community & service providers feedback before escalating proposal to ARFC snapshot stage
4. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal

### **Copyright:**

Copyright and related rights waived under [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)

cleaned.title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard steakLRT to Aave v3 Lido Instance

raw.title: [TEMP CHECK] Onboard steakLRT to Aave v3 Lido Instance
raw.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193
raw.body:
---
### [TEMP CHECK] Onboard steakLRT to Aave v3 Lido Instance
### Author: ACI
###  Date: 2024-08-02
---

### **Summary**

This proposal aims to onboard steakLRT, Steakhouse’s restaking token built on Mellow and Symbiotic, to the Ethereum v3 Lido Instance. 

### **Motivation**

The Steakhouse Resteaking Vault, steakLRT, is a wstETH-based liquid restaking token powered by Mellow and the Symbiotic restaking middleware. This is a logical extension of the work Steakhouse is doing as Lido DAO’s Finance Workstream, and is a work in progress proof of the crucial role that Lido stETH can play in helping restaking become more efficient, while preserving the decentralization of Ethereum.

The onboarding of steakLRT to the Aave v3 Lido instance aims to enhance the diversity and robustness of the Aave ecosystem by integrating a novel restaking token. 

steakLRT, built on Mellow and Symbiotic, brings unique value propositions and additional yield opportunities through boosted points programs. By including steakLRT, we can continue to attract user deposits from restaking narratives and support the further growth of a Lido instance. Further, beacuse steakLRT accepts wstETH deposits, there are strategic programs that can be run to increase wstETH deposit yield through looping strategies and liquidity mining. These will continue to make the Aave v3 Lido Instance the best place to deposit wstETH as collateral. 

### **Proof of Liquidity and Deposit Commitments**

Mellow and Symbiotic deposits held as LRTs like steakLRT earn Symbiotic and Mellow points. 

Mellow will do an additional boosted points program for deposits into the Aave v3 Lido instance. 

### **Specification**

Contract address: [0xbeef69ac7870777598a04b2bd4771c71212e6abc](https://etherscan.io/address/0xbeef69ac7870777598a04b2bd4771c71212e6abc)

Risk Parameters will be provided at ARFC Stage by Risk Service Providers.

### **Useful Links:**

steakLRT announcement post: https://hackmd.io/@SteakhouseFi/steakLRT

steakLRT Mellow Vault: https://app.mellow.finance/restake/ethereum-steaklrt

### **Disclaimer:**

This proposal is powered by Skywards. ACI is not directly affiliated with Steakhouse and did not receive compensation for creation this proposal.

Some ACI team members are investors in Mellow.

### **Next Steps**

1. If consensus is reached on this [TEMP CHECK], escalate this proposal to the Snapshot stage.
2. If the Snapshot outcome is YAE, this proposal will be escalated to ARFC stage
3. Publication of a standard ARFC, collect community & service providers feedback before escalating proposal to ARFC snapshot stage
4. If the ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, publish an AIP vote for final confirmation and enforcement of the proposal

### **Copyright:**

Copyright and related rights waived under [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)

decision.summary: The proposal to onboard cbBTC to Aave v3 on Base is strongly supported by early and stable voter participation, positive forum sentiment, and aligns with previous similar proposals that passed with strong support.
key_arguments_for: Strong early and consistent voter support for YAE option with 99.5% lead ratio and high stability metrics.
Forum discussion shows general neutral to positive sentiment with endorsement from key community members and risk services.
Similar past proposals to onboard assets had successful voting outcomes with positive or mixed market impact.
Onboarding cbBTC expands asset options for Bitcoin holders, leveraging Coinbase's reputation and liquidity.
key_arguments_against: Some community questions about oracle implementation and transparency remain unanswered at this stage.
Negative TVL impact observed post-vote in current timeline data could indicate cautious market sentiment.

evidence.quote: Forum comments show mostly neutral sentiment with one positive post supporting the proposal and clarifications on oracle implementations.
Timeline metrics indicate overwhelming early support for YAE with 99.5% lead ratio and perfect stability.
Similar past proposals onboarded assets with successful voting outcomes and mixed market reactions.

decision.simulation_reason: Decision based on timeline analysis, forum sentiment, and historical similar proposals, independent of final tally.
decision.ai_final_conclusion: Option 'YAE' selected with stance to keep 'Change'.
decision.ai_final_reason:
• The vote timeline shows near unanimous early and sustained support for the YAE option, indicating strong community consensus.
• Forum sentiment is mostly neutral to positive, with the first two comments highlighting positive anticipation and constructive questions, aligning with the recommendation.
• Historical similar proposals to onboard assets like STONE and Etherfi Aave v3 instances passed successfully with strong vote margins, supporting the decision to onboard cbBTC.
• Market data shows a slight positive price impact but a negative TVL impact; these mixed signals suggest caution but do not outweigh strong vote and sentiment support.
• The recommendation mirrors aggregated forum sentiment, indicating the decision aligns well with community views.
• Some concerns about oracle transparency remain and should be addressed in subsequent implementation stages to ensure risk mitigation.
